title: The Pledge (2001) Motion Picture Soundtrack - Hans Zimmer and Kl
description:
The official soundtrack of Sean Penn's surreal 2001 mystery drama, The Pledge, scored by Hans Zimmer and Klaus Badelt. 

Tracklist:

1. 	The Angler [5:24]
2. 	Boogey Man [1:27]
3. 	Jerry & Lori [1:00]
4. 	Church Nightmare [2:18]
5. 	Revisit Crime Scene [1:16]
6. 	My Coat [2:47]
7. 	The Wizard [4:05]
8. 	Ex Cop [1:49]
9. 	He'd Rather Not [2:00]
10. 	Land of Christmas [1:22]
11. 	Reading Stories [3:02]
12. 	Turkeys [1:36]
13. 	The Pledge [1:19]
14. 	The Swing [2:19]
15. 	Ginny's Picture [2:30]
16. 	You're Crazy [5:57]

Bonus Tracks:

1. Kenny Rogers - Through the Years
2. Mozambique Nwalhulwana Mazimbo
